about_the_game:
In a world on the brink of destruction, the Cleithosians and Shriners battle endlessly. A mysterious phenomenon escalates their war, driven by capricious deities Maar and Ishmaar. Follow Raphaëlle, a devout follower who becomes the vessel of Maar. Face divine absurdity and strife as you uncover the truth behind the chaos.

Gameplay Features:

Visual Novel Narrative: Immerse yourself in a rich story-driven experience, uncovering the mysteries of the world through engaging dialogues and events.

Turn-Based RPG Battles: Engage in strategic turn-based combat, utilizing a variety of skills and abilities to defeat your enemies. Plan your moves carefully, as each decision can turn the tide of battle.

Note: The base game includes 4 chapters. Additional DLC chapters will be available in the future.

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature Content Description

This game contains mature content that may not be suitable for all audiences. Players should be aware of the following themes and depictions:

Violence: The game features scenes of intense violence, including a sacrificial ritual in the opening scene where a female character is stabbed by a priest. Combat sequences also include graphic depictions of injury and death.

Nudity: There is nudity in the game, particularly in the context of rituals and certain story events.

Religious Themes: The story includes religious and sacrificial rituals that some players may find disturbing or sensitive.

Dark Themes: The narrative explores themes of war, divine manipulation, and existential dread, which may be unsettling for some players.
